wordpressPage.title: Poverty (Cards Against Humanity)
wordpressPage.content:
Have a look at the example round from ‘Cards Against Humanity’*

1 – What do you think about the statement?

2 – Do you agree or disagree with it? What do you think God thinks of poverty?

3 – What can we do to make a difference to people living in poverty?

(Suggested bible passage/story: 1 John 3:17-19)

* Cards Against Humanity is a card game popular amongst young people that encourages players to ‘fill in the blanks’ each round using their black cards to produce an answer that is the funniest or most offensive. The player who’s answer is deemed the best by the dealer wins that round.
